00025                 public static function get_adapter($name = DB_ADAPTER)
00026                 {
00027                         return isset(self::$adapters[$name]) ? self::$adapters[$name] : NULL;
00028                 }
00029

00037                 {
00038                         self::$adapters[$name] = $adapter;
00039                 }

00046                 {
00047                         return self::get_adapter(DB_ADAPTER);
00048                 }

00057                 public static function get_connection($name = DB_ADAPTER)
00058                 {
00059                         if (!isset(self::$pool[$name]))
00060                         {
00061                                 self::$pool[$name] = array();
00062                         }
00063                         if (count(self::$pool[$name]) > 0)
00064                         {
00065                                 foreach (self::$pool[$name] as $item)
00066                                 {
00067                                         if (!$item["in_use"])
00068                                         {
00069                                                 $item["in_use"] = TRUE;
00070                                                 return $item["connection"];
00071                                         }
00072                                 }
00073                         }
00074                         // Create a new connection
00075                         $adapter_class = get_class(self::get_adapter());
00076                         $conn = eval("return new {$adapter_class}();");
00077                         $item = array("in_use" => TRUE,
00078                                 "connection" => $conn);
00079                         // Add it to the pool
00080                         self::$pool[$name][] = $item;
00081                         // Return it
00082                         return $conn;
00083                 }
00084 
00093                 public static function close_connection($conn, $name = DB_ADAPTER)
00094                 {
00095                         if (count(self::$pool[$name]) > 0)
00096                         {
00097                                 foreach (self::$pool[$name] as $item)
00098                                 {
00099                                         if ($item["connection"] == $conn &&
00100                                                 $item["in_use"])
00101                                         {
00102                                                 $item["in_use"] = FALSE;
00103                                         }
00104                                 }
00105                         }
00106                 }
